title: Cuisinart BFP-650 1 HP Blender/Food Processor, Silver, 3_cup
features: 3-Cup food processor attachment with feed tube and pusher, slicer/shredder disc and stainless steel chopper blade
Pre-Programmed smoothie and ice crush functions
description: Style, convenience, and power come together in the Cuisinart electric can opener. With chrome accents and elegant contours, it fi ts in nicely with other modern countertop appliances. The easy single-touch operation effortlessly opens any standard size can. The precision power cut blade and strong magnetic lid holder are attached to the removable lever, which can be easily detached for quick cleanups.; Cuisinart deluxe can opener, stainless steel.
